meanings.definition: The act of creating or producing fiction.
meanings.sent1: Her fictioneerings brought magical worlds to life.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy reading the fictioneerings of talented authors.
meanings.sent3: His fictioneerings were so imaginative that they made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The artist's fictioneerings painted vivid pictures in the minds of readers.
meanings.sent5: The workshop focused on improving our fictioneerings skills.

meanings.definition: The work or output of a fiction writer.
meanings.sent1: The library displayed various fictioneerings for visitors to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: She received an award for her outstanding fictioneerings.
meanings.sent3: The book club discussed the latest fictioneerings over tea.
meanings.sent4: His fictioneerings were like windows into different worlds.
meanings.sent5: The bookstore showcased the best fictioneerings of the year.
